verses.verse: The burden<WH4853> of the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> to Israel<WH3478> by Malachi.<WH4401>

I have loved<WH157> you, said<WH5002> the LORD.<WH3068> Yet you say,<WH559> Wherein<WH4100> have you loved<WH157> us? Was not Esau<WH6215> Jacob's<WH3290> brother?<WH251> said<WH559> the LORD:<WH3068> yet I loved<WH157> Jacob,<WH3290>
And I hated<WH8130> Esau,<WH6215> and laid<WH7760> his mountains<WH2022> and his heritage<WH5159> waste<WH8077> for the dragons<WH8565> of the wilderness.<WH4057>

Whereas<WH3588> Edom<WH123> said,<WH559> We are impoverished,<WH7567> but we will return<WH7725> and build<WH1129> the desolate<WH2723> places; thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the LORD<WH3068> of hosts,<WH6635> They shall build,<WH1129> but I will throw<WH2040> down;<WH2040> and they shall call<WH7121> them, The border<WH1366> of wickedness,<WH7564> and, The people<WH5971> against whom<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> has indignation<WH2194> for ever.<WH5769>
And your eyes<WH5869> shall see,<WH7200> and you shall say,<WH559> The LORD<WH3068> will be magnified<WH1431> from the border<WH1366> of Israel.<WH3478>

A son<WH1121> honors<WH3513> his father,<WH2> and a servant<WH5650> his master:<WH113> if<WH518> then I be a father,<WH2> where<WH346> is my honor?<WH3519> and if<WH518> I be a master,<WH113> where<WH346> is my fear?<WH4172> said<WH559> the LORD<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635> to you, O priests,<WH3548> that despise<WH959> my name.<WH8034> And you say,<WH559> Wherein<WH4100> have we despised<WH959> your name?<WH8034>

You offer<WH5066> polluted<WH1351> bread<WH3899> on my altar;<WH4196> and you say,<WH559> Wherein<WH4100> have we polluted<WH1351> you? In that you say,<WH559> The table<WH7979> of the LORD<WH3068> is contemptible.<WH959>

And if<WH3588> you offer<WH5066> the blind<WH5787> for sacrifice,<WH2076> is it not evil?<WH7451> and if<WH3588> you offer<WH5066> the lame<WH6455> and sick,<WH2470> is it not evil?<WH7451> offer<WH7126> it now<WH4994> to your governor;<WH6346> will he be pleased<WH7521> with you, or<WH176> accept<WH5375> your person?<WH6440> said<WH559> the LORD<WH3068> of hosts.<WH6635>

And now,<WH6258> I pray<WH4994> you, beseech<WH2470> <WH6440> God<WH410> that he will be gracious<WH2603> to us: this<WH2063> has been<WH1961> by your means:<WH3027> will he regard<WH5375> your persons?<WH6440> said<WH559> the LORD<WH3068> of hosts.<WH6635>

Who<WH4310> is there even<WH1571> among you that would shut<WH5462> the doors<WH1817> for nothing? neither<WH3808> do you kindle<WH215> fire on my altar<WH4196> for nothing.<WH2600> I have no<WH639> pleasure<WH2656> in you, said<WH559> the LORD<WH3068> of hosts,<WH6635> neither<WH3808> will I accept<WH7521> an offering<WH4503> at your hand.<WH3027>

For from the rising<WH4217> of the sun<WH8121> even to the going<WH3996> down of the same my name<WH8034> shall be great<WH1419> among the Gentiles;<WH1471> and in every<WH3605> place<WH4725> incense<WH6999> shall be offered<WH5066> to my name,<WH8034> and a pure<WH2889> offering:<WH4503> for my name<WH8034> shall be great<WH1419> among the heathen,<WH1471> said<WH559> the LORD<WH3068> of hosts.<WH6635>
But you have profaned<WH2490> it, in that you say,<WH559> The table<WH7979> of the LORD<WH3068> is polluted;<WH1351> and the fruit<WH5108> thereof, even his meat,<WH400> is contemptible.<WH959>

You said<WH559> also, Behold,<WH2009> what a weariness<WH4972> is it! and you have snuffed<WH5301> at it, said<WH559> the LORD<WH3068> of hosts;<WH6635> and you brought<WH935> that which was torn,<WH1497> and the lame,<WH6455> and the sick;<WH2470> thus<WH3541> you brought<WH935> an offering:<WH4503> should I accept<WH7521> this of your hand?<WH3027> said<WH559> the LORD.<WH3068>

But cursed<WH779> be the deceiver,<WH5230> which<WH3426> has in his flock<WH5739> a male,<WH2145> and vows,<WH5087> and sacrifices<WH2076> to the LORD<WH136> a corrupt<WH7843> thing: for I am a great<WH1419> King,<WH4428> said<WH559> the LORD<WH3068> of hosts,<WH6635> and my name<WH8034> is dreadful<WH3372> among the heathen.<WH1471>
